permafrost.tundra.xml

Class XMLMinificationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.xml.XMLMinificationHelper

  • public final class XMLMinificationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for minifying XML.

        Removes extraneous whitespace and comments from the given XML content.

      • minify

        public static java.io.InputStream minify(java.io.InputStream content,
                                         java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Removes extraneous whitespace and comments from the given XML content.
        Parameters:
        content - The XML content to be minified.
        charset - The character set the character data is encoded with.
        Returns:
        The minified XML content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an IO error occurs.

      • minify

        public static java.io.InputStream minify(java.io.InputStream content,
                                         java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                         boolean removeComments,
                                         boolean removeInterTagSpaces)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Removes extraneous whitespace and comments from the given XML content.
        Parameters:
        content - The XML content to be minified.
        charset - The character set the character data is encoded with.
        removeComments - Whether XML comments should be removed as part of the minification.
        removeInterTagSpaces - Whether whitespace between tags should be removed as part of the minification.
        Returns:
        The minified XML content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When an IO error occurs.
